title: Why is Emperor Augustus the most famous among all emperors? - Quora

response.answer_text: He was the first ruler that today we define emperor. He was also the one with the longest period of ruling. After him, we call Augustus most of emperors (apart Kaiser and Tzar coming after Caesar). However, the Romans considered Trajan as the best emperor (Optimus Princeps). All new emperors were greeted by Senate by saying “We wish you to be luckier than Augustus and better than Trajan).

Because a) he was the first emperor and b) he essentially saved Rome from implosion and collapse by establishing the empire after the Civil War with Mark Antony. Augustus established the first imperial dynasty ( Julio - Claudian) and ushered in two and a half centuries of relative peace and prosperity. The only blot on his legacy was the Varian disaster in 9AD. i.e the destruction of Varus’ legions in the Teutoburg Forest.
